scripts.build: rm -rf vendor && mkdir vendor && cp node_modules/parinfer/parinfer.js vendor && cp node_modules/parinfer-codemirror/parinfer-codemirror.js vendor && cp node_modules/codemirror/lib/codemirror.css vendor && cp node_modules/codemirror/lib/codemirror.js vendor && cp node_modules/codemirror/mode/scheme/scheme.js vendor && cp node_modules/codemirror/mode/clojure/clojure.js vendor && cp node_modules/codemirror/addon/selection/active-line.js vendor && cp node_modules/codemirror/addon/edit/matchbrackets.js vendor
